Google CEO Eric Schmidt will be handing the reigns over to company co-founder Larry Page . In a blog post titled An update from the Chairman, Eric Schmidt detailed that he'll be serving as executive chairman, Larry Page will take over day-to-day operations, and Google's other co-founder Sergey Brin will simply take on the well-suited title of "Co-Founder."
